body:
First, aim at an enemy.
Next, rotate 720 then shoot it at an enemy.
You will get points when you do a noscope.

It only works on TDM.

Pros:
+AFK players can get killed while noscoped
+For DTM or CTW, the enemy with one or two hearts might die for a final strike.

Cons:
-An enemy might walk away or run and miss.
-An enemy will immediately kill you when you do that.
-DTM or CTW mode.
